name: 24 - T13 - Simple Color
author: Njc5YzFjZDI5NjZl
command:
let params =
[{
    filterType: "field",
    filterId: "mySimpleField",
    shieldType: 13,
    gridPadding: 2,
    alpha: 0.25,
    color: 0xCCCC00,
    time: 0,
    blend: 14,
    intensity: 1.10,
    lightSize: 0,
    scale: 1,
    radius: 1,
    chromatic: false,
}];

await TokenMagic.addUpdateFiltersOnSelected(params);
